docs.lead_paragraph: The new hipster high-end clothing store Aloha Rag is full of bold, clubby, beyond-my-income clothes, and is the perfect place to find your wardrobe for an End of the World party.

headline.seo: Critical Shopper: A Visit to Aloha Rag
headline.main: Obscure Labels of a Boldface Kind
headline.print_headline: Obscure Labels of A Boldface Kind

docs.snippet: The new hipster high-end clothing store Aloha Rag is full of bold, clubby, beyond-my-income clothes, and is the perfect place to find your wardrobe for an End of the World party.

docs.lead_paragraph: Senator Barack Obama was giving an address by satellite to the Service Employees International Union convention on Wednesday, when he unexpectedly began talking about a nursing home worker from New York City who died last month.

headline.main: Obama Cites Case of Bronx Nursing Aide

docs.abstract: The presumptive Democratic Party nominee cited Audrey Smith-Campbell, who died on May 13. She and 220 other workers are on strike to protest a nursing home's decision to stop paying for health benefits.
docs.snippet: The presumptive Democratic Party nominee cited Audrey Smith-Campbell, who died on May 13. She and 220 other workers are on strike to protest a nursing home's decision to stop paying for health benefits.

docs.lead_paragraph: Prosecutors investigating a crane collapse took away boxes of documents and computers from the offices of New York Crane and Equipment, two people involved in the inquiry said.

headline.main: Documents Said to Be Seized From Crane Owner’s Offices

docs.lead_paragraph: Massachusetts reduced its proportion of uninsured adults by nearly half in the first year of mandatory health coverage.
